QuestData.Title: New Babies
QuestData.Description: That's better, but there's still something wrong. I'm getting desperate here, $n.$B$BCan I call ya, $n? Great.$B$BLook, I think I have it now. I know what's wrong.$B$BThey miss their babies.$B$BYeah! When they first came here, the, uh... the bastard hunters that... abandoned them said they left the babies behind.$B$BIf we're going to save them from a life of misery, if we're going to save those babies, <under his breath> and turn a tidy profit, we've got to get them some new babies!
QuestData.CompletionText: Look, I know these things can be stubborn, but it's all going to be worth it in the end.$B$BTrust me.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it, $n! Mama, papa, and family. It brings a tear to my eye.$B$BHere, take this runty one. Now that I have the whole herd, this one's just an extra mouth to feed and won't fetch anything at market.
